level.text: The operator shall be required to fill out all pertinent information on the noise data form for field measurements.
For each set of readings, the following information shall be required:
All instrumentation models and identifying numbers;
A sketch of the site, including measurements points, noise sources, buildings, etc.;
Measurement of noise peaks and steady levels to the nearest decibel, and durations;
A description of special techniques employed;
A description of the noise, noting especially if there is an apparent pure tone or impulsive content;
The meter damping used (fast or slow); and
Measurement of ambient and description of ambient if obvious (highway, dogs, etc.).
If the ambient level is four to ten (4-10) dB(A) below the level found with the source operating, corrections shall be made to obtain the source noise level. The corrections shall be shown.
